caption.p: In vitro release of TAL from the pure raw TAL powder, marketed product (Cordanum ®) and the representative self-emulsifying formulations in (pH 6.8) at 37°C. The formulations represent (F2) CoFA:I988(7:3)/TO106V(1/1), (F6) I308:TC(1:1)/HCO30(1/1), (AF6) CMCM:TC(1:1)/HCO30(1/1) and (AF7) TC. Data are represented as mean ± SD, n = 3.
